data.title: StreetEasy: 1010 Fifth Avenue in Upper East Side, #12C - Sales, Rentals, Floorplans
data.meta_description: Find New York City apartments for rent and for sale at StreetEasy. StreetEasy is a Real Estate Search Engine for apartments and real estate in Manhattan and New York City. Search our site for apartments, condos, coops, lofts, townhouses and new construction homes in Manhattan, Brooklyn, Bronx, Queens and Staten Island.
data.text:
WOW! This stunning, beautifully renovated, high-floor, sun-flooded apartment with open views is breathtaking. One enters the apartment through a semi-private vestibule leading into an impressive 21â€™ foot long gallery with the living room, with wood burning fireplace, at one end and the dining room/library at the other. The large primary corner bedroom suite, accessed from the living room, faces East and South and has a spacious en suite bathroom with walk-in shower as well as a charming, fully fitted dressing room. Adjacent are two other bedrooms, one now used as a study, that share a bathroom. These rooms, as well as a spacious dining room/library, and an impeccably renovated kitchen with breakfast area all face East and get amazing morning sun. Off the kitchen, there is a powder room plus a laundry and fully equipped office. The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors and is in excellent, move-in condition. There is thru-wall air conditioning throughout.

1010 Fifth Avenue, located opposite the the Metropolitan Museum of Art, is a fine, large, pre-war, white glove cooperative apartment building on the corner of Fifth Avenue and 82nd Street. It was designed and erected by Frederick F. French in 1928. The building has a resident super, full-time doormen, and attended elevator service. It has a fitness center, private storage bins and is pet friendly. 40% financing permitted. 2% flip tax.
